Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Authorizes the transfer of pregnant and postpartum incarcerated individuals to residential treatment facilities
Summary: Authorizes the transfer of pregnant and postpartum incarcerated individuals to residential treatment facilities; requires annual reporting on the number of such incarcerated individuals transferred.
LawCode: Add ยง72-d, amd ยง73, Cor L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to authorizing the transfer of pregnant and postpartum incarcerated individuals to residential treatment facilities
